Two days after it was announced Sebastian Vettel would be leaving Ferrari at the end of 2020, the Italian team have confirmed Carlos Sainz as Charles Leclercs new team mate from 2021 onwards.

articles.author: David Prestipino
articles.title: McGowan slips the boot in again as AFL hub snub leaves WA clubs off course - The Age
articles.description: WA Premier Mark McGowan has again lambasted Victorian AFL clubs for not wanting to hub in the state to help restart the season.
articles.content:
"That was the opportunity, that's what the the AFL wrote to us to suggest, subject to the quarantine requirements, but they decided not to accept that and that's a sad development, but we move on."
South Australian teams Adelaide and Port will also be based … [+3724 chars]

articles.title: Hub or no hub, all teams shouldn’t complain about fairness: Healy - Fox Sports
articles.description: With some teams in hubs and others out, the playing field won’t be perfectly level when the 2020 AFL season resumes.
articles.content:
But for the sake of the competition, any complaints over fairness need to be laid to bed, Gerard Healy says.
Due to travel restrictions in their own states, teams from Western Australia and South Australia will enter a hub on the Gold Coast before competitio… [+2536 chars]

articles.author: Daile Cross
articles.title: Perth man's mum tells him to 'enjoy' hotel quarantine - and this video is the result - WAtoday
articles.description: Mark Fay followed his mother's advice and was determined to enjoy himself. The result? This amusing video taped while in lockdown in the hotel.
articles.content:
Mark Fay had been living in London and working as a tour guide through Europe when the coronavirus pandemic hit.
It was time to come back home to Perth, and that meant spending two weeks in government-enforced isolation upon arrival in Western Australia at t… [+318 chars]
